strings.s: Oh Lord... I can't believe I'm allowing a creep take pictures of me like this...
I can hear you, girl...
You only gave me my panties and boots... I thought you...
And that's how you thank me? Panties and boots are a hot combo... Now stop whining and try to relax...
You know... I always wanted to work as a photographer before this job... I'd probably be much more successful if I had the opportunity to shoot hot models like you...
Yeah... Looking beautiful...
Hey... Your embarassed attitude made some cute frames, but I need some better poses now...
You... You want me to make poses?!
Of course... I already said you to not worry... No one will see these pictures, except me and the collector...
Now, come on... Show me that backside...
Yeah... This is it...
Some big nice cheeks you have there, girl...
Now it's time to get rid of the panties...
What!?! But you said...
Hey... We can't have a proper photo session without you showing the main 'assets'... So get the panties down...
Now!
OBEY
REFUSE
Good... You made the smart choice...
Now, come on... The clock is ticking... Just pull it down...
Yeah... It wasn't difficult, wast it?
Now... Show me another good pose... If you want your clothes back, these photos must worth the price... Lean there and make use of your modeling skills...
Sigh... You're really an annoying girl...
Then show me another good pose... If you want your clothes back, these photos must worth the price... Lean there and make use of your modeling skills...
Yeah... Much better now...
Oh, man... I can already hear the lucrative offers I'll receive for you... I, mean... for your pictures...
Come on now, girl... Drop the panties... I need hotter pictures...
But... but... I can't just stand here fully naked...
Look... How about this... Drop the panties and I will give you also some of my money... so you'll have a head start next time you try to recover your artifact playing cards with me...
ACCEPT OFFER
Good... You made the smart choice...
Now, come on... You accepted the deal... Just pull it down...
Yeah... It wasn't difficult, wast it?
So... How does it feel?
How... does it feel? What do you...
You just dropped your panties for a man in exchange for money... Do you know how we call this?
No... It's not like that... I... I just wanted to...
Whatever... You can try to deny it, but you knew what you're doing... Let's keep working...
You're testing my patience, girl...
You better start making some good poses now to compensate...
You are working like a pro, girl.... I loved the way you promptly dropped your panties when I asked... Now keep the pace and strike more sexy poses for me...
Nice one.... You're definetively getting the hang of it, girl...
You should quit the archaeology thing... Because anyone can see your real talent is to work on this...
One more!
Oh, man... Look at this... She's a pro...
Just amazing...
Well... This one wraps our photo shoot...
Oh... Are we done, already?
I'm sorry, girl... I can see you quickly took a fancy to sexy modeling and wanted more, but my memory card is already full of your pictures...
No... I didn't mean that... I just want to know if...
Yeah... You can keep yourself in denial, girl... But I can see you true self blooming behind the innocent attitude... You can take your clothes back...
Finally... Thank God this is over...
Come on... It wasn't that bad... And I could almost see you having fun...
It was just... humiliating...
Whatever... You can have your clothes back now...
Sigh... I can finally get dressed again...
Hey... Before you leave...
Here... This is for your good work...
I love it when they become speechless...
Now don't go spending all of it on drinks or gambling...
Thanks, girl... If you still want your precious artifact, we can always play again...
